title: Skin Team messed up a great opportunity
body:
http://i.imgur.com/XTbO4sq.png

http://i.imgur.com/MGgm3h4.png

Instead of giving us a recoloring of classic Kalista, they could've given some other champ a champion skin and went with Barista Kalista throwing coffee at people. 

But this is the same team that thought this art

http://i.imgur.com/jhLLMzs.jpg

needed to be changed to this art

http://i.imgur.com/wXjcGqM.jpg
